22-0125.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, October 26, 2021.A motion was made by Vice Chair Supernaw, seconded by Member Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and RichardsonPage 1 of 2TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMWEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 2, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

22-0126.summary: Recommendation to receive and file staff recommendations for the City’s 2022 Federal Legislative Agenda, gather input from the Federal Legislation Committee, and forward the Committee’s recommendations to the City Council for adoption.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided the staff report.Chair Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Supernaw spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Supernaw and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Councilwoman Saro spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.A motion was made by Chair Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and Richardson3.
